alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued July 15 at 11:40AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Air Quality Alert for Sunday July 16... The Michigan Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy has declared Sunday July 16...to be an Action Day for elevated levels of fine particulates. Pollutants are expected to be in the unhealthy for sensitive groups range. The Action Day is in effect for the following Michigan counties... Berrien, Cass, Saint Joseph, Branch and Hillsdale. Smoke originating from wildfires in west and central Canada will lead to increases in fine particulates concentrations. People and businesses are urged to avoid activities such as... refueling vehicles or topping off when refueling...using gasoline powered lawn equipment...and using charcoal lighter fluid. Positive activities include...car pooling...biking to work...delaying or combining errands...and using water based paints. It is recommended that active children and adults...and persons with respiratory diseases such as asthma...limit prolonged outdoor exertion. && For further information...please see the Michigan Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy page at... http://www.michigan.gov/EGLE.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
